channel.title: [All] How to add Iamadam's account creator to your client
channel.description:
[u]How to add Iamadam's account creator[/u] Credits: Iamadam and the Aryan devs for the account creator Pimjong for the tutorial on how to add it to your client
This is also VERY EASY. The account creator is in a class file. You can download it here: [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=GT7GKPKJ]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=GT7GKPKJ[/url] Once you downloaded it, put it in the same folder as your client files are in. Then, you need to run it with a batch file, like this: [code]java NewChar[/code] But, you have to make a new batch file for it, and that isnt very cool. So, you could add it in the same batch file as the one which starts your client, something like this: [code]@echo off
:mainmenu echo c - Start client echo n - Create an account echo e - Exit SET /p choise=You choose: if %choise%==c goto language if %choise%==e goto exit if %choise%==n goto newchar
:newchar java NewChar pause goto mainmenu
:exit exit[/code] Now, you can choose between Starting the client, Creating an account and Exiting the CMD. Also, when you finished the Account Creator, you will go back to the main-menu.
- Pimjong

item.title: [All] How to add Iamadam's account creator to your client
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

This isn’t really much of a client hacking tip. Teach us how to put it onto your client… Which isn’t much of client hacking either, unless you’re going to teach us how to put a frame on the client, which just turns out to be an entirely different tutorial.

item.title: [All] How to add Iamadam's account creator to your client
item.dc:creator: @pimjong pimjong
item.description:
@pimjong wrote:

How to add Iamadam’s account creator
Credits: Iamadam and the Aryan devs for the account creator
Pimjong for the tutorial on how to add it to your client

This is also VERY EASY.
The account creator is in a class file.
You can download it here:
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=GT7GKPKJ
Once you downloaded it, put it in the same folder as your client files are in.
Then, you need to run it with a batch file, like this:

java NewChar

But, you have to make a new batch file for it, and that isnt very cool.
So, you could add it in the same batch file as the one which starts your client, something like this:

[code]@echo off

:mainmenu
echo c - Start client
echo n - Create an account
echo e - Exit
SET /p choise=You choose:
if %choise%==c goto language
if %choise%==e goto exit
if %choise%==n goto newchar

:newchar
java NewChar
pause
goto mainmenu

:exit
exit[/code]
Now, you can choose between Starting the client, Creating an account and Exiting the CMD.
Also, when you finished the Account Creator, you will go back to the main-menu.

  • Pimjong

Read full topic
item.source: [All] How to add Iamadam's account creator to your client
